name: podamShouldHandleShortValuesWithThePodamShortValueAnnotation

testSteps.description: When I invoke the factory manufacturing for class uk.co.jemos.podam.test.dto.annotations.ShortValuePojo

Then the object ShortRangeValuesPojo ( shortFieldWithMinValueOnly = 1    shortFieldWithMaxValueOnly = 99    shortFieldWithMinAndMaxValue = 57    shortObjectFieldWithMinValueOnly = 1    shortObjectFieldWithMaxValueOnly = 91    shortObjectFieldWithMinAndMaxValue = 36    shortFieldWithPreciseValue = 17     ) should not be null
Then the value 1 should be greater or equal than 1
Then the short value 99 should be lower or equal than 100
Then the short value 57 should be between 1 and 1000
Then the object 1 should not be null
Then the value 1 should be greater or equal than 1
Then the object 99 should not be null
Then the short value 91 should be lower or equal than 100
Then the object 36 should not be null
Then the short value 36 should be between 1 and 100
Then the short value 17 should be precisely 17

title: Podam should handle both native and wrapped short values with @PodamShortValue annotation
